subject: Football
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Known as the Brahma Bull for his bruising play as an all-American at Georgia Tech and as an 11-year professional, Mr. Morris was named to the N.F.L.’s all-decade team for the 1960s.
snippet: Known as the Brahma Bull for his bruising play as an all-American at Georgia Tech and as an 11-year professional, Mr. Morris was named to the N.F.L.’s all-decade team for the 1960s.
